description: Pins external repositories for stable code references. Run 'python tools/bootstrap.py' to clone.

repos.name: LoopWorkspace
repos.description: Loop iOS app workspace with all dependencies

repos.name: cgm-remote-monitor
repos.description: Nightscout CGM Remote Monitor web application

repos.name: nightscout-connect
repos.description: Nightscout Connect bridge for data sources

repos.name: nightscout-reporter
repos.description: Nightscout Reporter for generating PDF reports

repos.name: nightscout-roles-gateway
repos.description: Nightscout Roles Gateway for access control

repos.name: oref0
repos.description: OpenAPS Reference Design - core dosing algorithm (oref0/oref1)

repos.name: openaps
repos.description: OpenAPS toolkit - device interface and data management

repos.name: nightguard
repos.description: Nightguard iOS/watchOS app for blood glucose monitoring via Nightscout

repos.name: xdripswift
repos.description: xDrip4iOS - iOS app for CGM data management and Nightscout sync

repos.name: xDrip
repos.description: xDrip+ Android app for CGM data collection and Nightscout sync

repos.name: DiaBLE
repos.description: DiaBLE - Diabetes Libre app for reading Libre sensors on iOS/watchOS

repos.name: xdrip-js
repos.description: Node.js library for interfacing with Dexcom G5/G6 transmitters via BLE
